[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
CLASS
enum CLASS {...}

Entity classification

Can be set on entities with KeyValue using key 'classify'.

Values
CLASS_FORCE_NONE

(-1) Forces class override to none

CLASS_NONE

(0) No classification

CLASS_MACHINE

(1) Is machine

CLASS_PLAYER

(2) Is player

CLASS_HUMAN_PASSIVE

(3) Is passive human

CLASS_HUMAN_MILITARY

(4) Is military human

CLASS_ALIEN_MILITARY

(5) Is military alien

CLASS_ALIEN_PASSIVE

(6) Is passive alien

CLASS_ALIEN_MONSTER

(7) Is monster alien

CLASS_ALIEN_PREY

(8) Is prey alien

CLASS_ALIEN_PREDATOR

(9) Is predator alien

CLASS_INSECT

(10) Is insect

CLASS_PLAYER_ALLY

(11) is player ally

CLASS_PLAYER_BIOWEAPON

(12) Is player bioweapon

CLASS_ALIEN_BIOWEAPON

(13) Is alien bioweapon

CLASS_XRACE_PITDRONE

(14) Is X-Race pitdrone

CLASS_XRACE_SHOCK

(15) Is X-Race shock trooper (also Voltigores)

CLASS_TEAM1

(16) Is on Team 1

CLASS_TEAM2

(17) Is on Team 2

CLASS_TEAM3

(18) Is on Team 3

CLASS_TEAM4

(19) Is on Team 4

CLASS_BARNACLE

(99) Is Barnacle
